channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping - Christmas trees under bridge, 12th January
item.description:
Several Christmas trees have been dumped on the pavement under the bridge. They are entirely obstructing the pavement, there is no room to walk around them. The trees have been here for several days.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mentmore Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Rubbish dumped ouside 12 Burwash Road, 12th January
item.description:
Various items were placed outside no 12 Burwash Road, presumably for the waste collection, but 2 months later they are still there. Items include an old vacuum cleaner and some metal struts.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Burwash Road, Plumstead

item.title: Opposite 335 - 337 Bedonwell Road broken paving slab, 12th January
item.description:
The paving slab has broken and left a hole about 2 ft deep.It is just on the edge of the pavement and the end of the pathway leading to the El SUb Station opposite 335- 337 Bedonwell Road. It is extremely dangerous as it is a trip hazard . Please can this be looked into with a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bedonwell Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
